page.title: 07A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY, TWENTY
page.content: This eleven year old's day starts at approximately 7 o'clock when Spencer prepares for school. He is ready by 7.40 when he has his breakfast. He catches the bus at 8.10 and arrives at school at about 8.45 where he plays with his friends until about 9 o'clock, when school starts. School finishes at 3.30 when Spencer gets back on the bus and arrives home by 4pm. He then either watches television or goes out to play with his friends. On Fridays there is normally a Youth Club with a disco every week. There is a playing field where he some times plays football. He also fishes in the local river, the Bourne Eau. Some of Spencer's favourite games are cards,'Monopoly' and darts, which he plays well.He watches television a lot, finally going to bed at 9 o'clock
